The Account Admin Password is 6969
The data.txt stores the dynamic Variables tables are
Registration#/CICN|Name|Balance|AccID|Card#

to register an account select account management input 13 registration number
and input initial deposit then hit register once register use the registration number
to the other input then press info to get the Account details including the Card number and Pin
the Account Number, Card Number and Pin are randomly Generated

to log in the atm first input the cardNum and PIN then press Accept
[The Cancel, Accept and Clear are bugged atm and harder to see]
